description:
Prepare yourself for a future helping us all get what we eat in a more environmentally sustainable way with a Bachelor of Science or a Master of Science degree in Sustainable Food Systems: 
https://asuonline.asu.edu/online-degree-programs/undergraduate/sustainable-food-systems/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video_paid&utm_content=sh-scishow-video&utm_campaign=02-sh_scishow_sustainable_food_systems_bs&ecd22=02&utm_term= 

When it comes to a beverage menu, I don't usually want to see "tears" on the list. But these three animals do, including bees whose favorite drink is human tears!

Hosted by: Stefan Chin (he/him)

title: Scientists Let Bees Land in their Eyes
